description.dutch: Hijs de vlag aan het einde van de basistraining.
description.english: Raise the flag at the end of the basic training
description.french: Hisser le drapeau à la fin des classes
description.german: Hisse die Fahne nach Abschluss der Grundausbildung.
description.italian: Issa la bandiera alla fine dell'addestramento di base.
description.japanese: 基礎訓練終了時に旗を揚げる
description.polish: Wciągnij flagę na maszt na zakończenie szkolenia.
description.portuguese: Levante a bandeira ao final do treinamento básico.
description.spanish: Iza la bandera al terminar el entrenamiento básico.

description.dutch: Verwoest de tractor voor Emile wordt geplet.
description.english: Shoot the tractor before it crushes Emile
description.french: Détruire le tracteur avant qu'il n'écrase Émile
description.german: Zerstöre den Schlepper, bevor er Emile zerquetscht.
description.italian: Spara al trattore prima che schiacci Emile.
description.japanese: エミールにぶつかる前にトラクターを撃つ
description.portuguese: Atire no trator antes que ele esmague Emile.
description.russian: Взорвать трактор до того, как он раздавит Эмиля
description.spanish: Dispara al tractor antes de que aplaste a Emile.

displayName.english: It's all fire and death now...
displayName.japanese: みんな燃えてしまった…
displayName.portuguese: Agora tudo é fogo e morte...

description.dutch: Aanschouw de crash van de luchtballon.
description.french: Assister au crash du zeppelin
description.italian: Assisti allo schianto dello zeppelin.
description.japanese: 飛行船の墜落を目撃する
description.portuguese: Presencie a queda do zeppelin.
description.spanish: Mira cómo se estrella el zepelín.

description.dutch: Red Karl van onder de luchtballon.
description.english: Rescue Karl from underneath the zeppelin
description.french: Sortir Karl de sous la nacelle du zeppelin et le sauver
description.italian: Estrai Karl dalle macerie dello zeppelin.
description.japanese: 飛行船の下からカールを救い出す
description.portuguese: Resgate Karl de debaixo do zeppelin.
description.russian: Спасти Карла, вытащив его из-под цеппелина
description.spanish: Saca a Karl de debajo del zepelín.

description.dutch: Voltooi de Douaumont Fort-missie.
description.french: Terminer la mission du Fort de Douaumont
description.italian: Termina la missione a Fort de Douaumont.
description.japanese: ドゥオーモン要塞の任務を達成する
description.portuguese: Termine a missão do Forte Douaumont.
description.spanish: Termina la misión de Fort Douaumont.

displayName.dutch: Wraak is niet de weg naar geluk
displayName.french: La vengeance ne rend pas heureux
displayName.italian: La vendetta non dà la felicità
displayName.spanish: Venganza no es igual a felicidad

description.dutch: Versla Baron von Dorf.
description.french: Battre le baron Von Dorf
description.italian: Sconfiggi il barone Von Dorf.
description.japanese: フォン・ドルフ男爵を倒す
description.portuguese: Derrote o Barão Von Dorf.
description.spanish: Derrota al barón Von Dorf.

displayName.dutch: Zo dichtbij en toch zo ver weg
displayName.german: So nah und doch so fern
displayName.polish: Tak blisko, a jednak tak daleko!
displayName.russian: Так близко и все же так далеко!

description.dutch: Ontsnap aan het Franse leger met Anna en Karl.
description.english: Escape the French army with Anna and Karl
description.french: Échapper à l'armée française avec Anna et Karl
description.german: Entkomme der französischen Armee mit Anna und Karl.
description.italian: Fuggi dall'esercito francese con Anna and Karl.
description.japanese: アンナ、カールとともにフランス軍から逃げる
description.polish: Wraz z Anną i Karlem ucieknij francuskiej armii
description.portuguese: Fuja do exército francês com Anna e Karl.
description.russian: Сбежать от французских военных с Анной и Карлом
description.spanish: Huye del ejército francés con Anna y Karl.

displayName.japanese: 生き延びるものもいれば…

description.dutch: Red Karl
description.french: Sauver Karl
description.italian: Salva Karl
description.japanese: カールを助け出す
description.portuguese: Salve Karl
description.spanish: Salva a Karl.

displayName.japanese: 帰って来ないものもいた

description.dutch: Voltooi het spel.
description.french: Terminer le jeu
description.italian: Concludi il gioco.
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする
description.portuguese: Termine o jogo.
description.spanish: Termina la partida.

description.dutch: Luid de bel 3 keer in Ieper.
description.english: Ring the bell 3 times in Ypres
description.french: Faire sonner la cloche 3 fois à Ypres
description.german: Läute die Glocke von Ypern 3 Mal.
description.italian: Suona 3 volte la campana a Ypres.
description.japanese: イーペルで鐘を3回鳴らす
description.polish: Uderz 3 razy w dzwon w Ypres
description.portuguese: Toque o sino 3 vezes em Ypres.
description.russian: Трижды позвонить в колокол в Ипре
description.spanish: Toca la campana 3 veces en Ypres.

description.dutch: Duw alle waszakken.
description.french: Pousser tous les sacs de linges sales
description.italian: Spingi tutti i carrelli dei panni.
description.japanese: 洗濯物袋をすべて押す
description.portuguese: Carregue todas as bolsas de lavanderia.
description.spanish: Lleva todas las bolsas de ropa.

description.dutch: Red je peloton tijdens de Slag aan de Somme.
description.english: Save your entire platoon during the battle of Somme
description.french: Sauver le bataillon pendant la bataille de la Somme
description.german: Rette deinen gesamten Zug in der Schlacht an der Somme.
description.italian: Salva tutto il tuo plotone durante la battaglia della Somme.
description.japanese: ソンムの戦いで小隊全体を救う
description.polish: Uratuj cały swój pluton w bitwie nad Sommą
description.portuguese: Salve seu pelotão inteiro durante a batalha de Somme.
description.russian: Спасти свой отряд во время битвы на Сомме
description.spanish: Salva a todo tu pelotón durante la batalla de Somme.

description.dutch: Schiet op de Duitse vlag met het kanon bij Vimy.
description.english: Shoot the German flag with the cannon at Vimy's ridge
description.french: Tirer sur le drapeau allemand avec le canon à la crête de Vimy
description.german: Schieße mit der Kanone auf der Höhe von Vimy die deutsche Flagge ab.
description.italian: Colpisci con una cannonata la bandiera tedesca sul crinale di Vimy.
description.japanese: ビミー・リッジでボーナスの標的を砲撃する
description.polish: Ostrzelaj z działa niemiecką flagę na wzgórzu Vimy
description.portuguese: Atire na bandeira alemã com o canhão na colina de Vimy.
description.russian: Обстрелять из пушки германский флаг на хребте Вими
description.spanish: Dispara a la bandera alemana con el cañón en la Cresta de Vimy.

description.dutch: Red Karl voor de derde keer zonder fouten te maken
description.english: Save Karl for the third time without making any mistakes
description.french: Sauver Karl pour la troisième fois, sans faire une seule erreur
description.german: Rette Karl zum dritten Mal, ohne Fehler zu begehen.
description.italian: Salva Karl per la terza volta senza fare errori
description.japanese: 失敗せずに3度目にカールを助ける
description.polish: Ulecz Karla po raz trzeci, nie popełniając przy tym żadnego błędu
description.portuguese: Salve Karl pela terceira vez sem cometer nenhum erro
description.russian: Спасти жизнь Карла в третий раз, не допустив ни одной ошибки
description.spanish: Salva a Karl por tercera vez sin cometer errores.

description.dutch: Aai de hond.
description.french: Caresser le chien
description.italian: Coccola il cane.
description.japanese: 犬をなでる。
description.portuguese: Faça carinho no cachorro.
description.spanish: Acaricia al perro.

description.dutch: Voltooi 1 taximissie zonder de auto te beschadigen.
description.english: Complete 1 taxi mission without damaging the car
description.french: Terminer une mission taxi sans abimer la voiture
description.german: Schließe eine Taximission ab, ohne das Fahrzeug zu beschädigen.
description.italian: Compi 1 missione taxi senza danneggiare la vettura.
description.japanese: タクシーを傷付けずに任務をクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ jedną misję taksówkarza, nie uszkadzając samochodu
description.portuguese: Complete 1 missão de táxi sem danificar o carro.
description.russian: Выполнить одно задание по перевозке пассажиров, не повредив машину
description.spanish: Completa 1 misión con el taxi sin deteriorarlo.

description.dutch: Vind 5 historische voorwerpen.
description.french: Trouver 5 objets historiques
description.italian: Trova 5 reperti storici.
description.japanese: 歴史的アイテムを5個見つける
description.portuguese: Encontre 5 itens históricos.
description.spanish: Encuentra 5 objetos históricos.

description.dutch: Vind 50 historische voorwerpen.
description.french: Trouver 50 objets historiques
description.italian: Trova 50 reperti storici.
description.japanese: 歴史的アイテムを50個見つける
description.portuguese: Encontre 50 itens históricos.
description.spanish: Encuentra 50 objetos históricos.

description.dutch: Vind alle historische voorwerpen.
description.french: Trouver tous les objets historiques
description.italian: Trova tutti i reperti storici.
description.japanese: すべての歴史的アイテムを見つける
description.portuguese: Encontre todos os itens históricos.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los objetos históricos.

description.dutch: Lees 30 historische feitjes.
description.french: Lire 30 faits historiques
description.italian: Leggi 30 fatti storici.
description.japanese: 史実を30件読む
description.portuguese: Leia 30 fatos históricos.
description.spanish: Lee 30 datos históricos.
